name: Rise From Hell
description:
This game is a platformer that encompasses many different platforming mechanics. The game also takes some inspiration from the original Donkey Kong game.  The game has players traversing through the depths of hell while avoiding the crumbling rocks.  The game will bring challenges to the player that they must overcome themselves.  Problem solving with getting past obstacles is a big part of this game

In the game you are a demon who feels they have been wrongly judged and sent to hell. Your goal is to climb through hell to make it to where you want to be, heaven. There will be challenges along the way for you to prove yourself and why you should be in heaven.

Credits

-Character done by: Kin Ng with the Dragon Warrior (Free) pack

-Ground block art done by: GrayLabInitiative with the Magic Ground Textures pack

-Rock art done by: Mikelarg with the Cracked stone filled with lava pack

-Door art done by: Merrril with the Simpleee Isometric House Pack

-Background done by: Super Brutal Assets with the Free 2d Hand Painted-Background pack
